origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'DaimlerAPI.analyze_supplier_data', 'description': 'This function analyzes supplier collaboration data for a specified company, focusing on specific advanced manufacturing technologies.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'company', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the company, e.g., Daimler.'}, {'name': 'technology', 'type': 'LIST', 'description': 'A list of advanced manufacturing technologies to focus on, e.g., 车联网, 智能制造.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'analysis', 'description': 'The analysis of supplier collaboration data for the specified company and technologies.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 DaimlerAPI.analyze_supplier_data, 它的参数输入如下: 'company'是'Daimler', 'technology'是['车联网', '智能制造'].
